Articles.Content:
While I have created a craft that is Lunex style and got it working, I am still trying to refine it so that it is as close to a replica as possible.

So while I have read the Lunex pdf, I still have some questions:

  1. Does it have room for a Rover? (my understanding is that cargo will travel there seperately; my original version did have a rover)
  2. Should the booster be using the 3.5m parts (Saturn/Nova class) or 2.5m? (Unable to derive anything, since all they really said is "large booster". I used 3.5 in my original version)
  3. Which one is more realistic: using Solid Booster, Liquid Booster, or no Booster? (This one is literally a "use of liquid and/or solid booster)
  4. How many people does it carry in total? (My version can carry 6, but original plan is 3?)
  5. Is having nuclear battery realistic? (That's what my original version used)

I do realized that lunex is mostly just on paper, but I do want to get the replica version done well.

Edited July 24, 2016 by Jestersage
